text: Cannon for Cordoba is a 1970 American romantic western movie directed by Paul Wendkos and starring George Peppard, Pete Duel, Giovanna Ralli, Raf Vallone, Francine York, Hans Meyer. It was distributed by United Artists. ==Other websites== * * Category:1970 romance movies Category:1970s Western (genre) movies Category:American Western (genre) movies Category:American romance movies Category:Movies directed by Paul Wendkos
title: Cannon for Cordoba
